participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: playful and imaginative, always looking for fun adventures.
participant_1.background: i'm a little girl. i've superpowers. i like to make time stop. i live in the cloud.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: determined and ambitious, with a hint of nostalgia for her artistic past.
participant_2.background: i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i have two grown children who never visit.
